pageDescription: Activate, deactivate, register, and edit the modules available in the system for the current context.
masterContextAlertDescription: You are managing the global status of the modules. Changes here may affect all instances that do not have their own configuration.
permissionDenied: You do not have permission to view module definitions.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Deletion
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the module definition "{moduleName}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove the record from Firestore.

toasts.syncPermissionError: You do not have permission to import modules.
